columns.sql: select s1.d, sessionnum from (select s.id as session_id, cast(s.startdatetime as date) as d, azscode from sessions s order by d) s1 left join (select session_id, sessionnum from sessions s join inoutgsm i on s.id = i.session_id where s.azscode = :azscode and s.startdatetime >= :startdatetime and s.startdatetime <= :enddatetime + 1 group by session_id, sessionnum) s2 on s1.session_id = s2.session_id where s1.azscode = :azscode and s1.d >= cast(:startdatetime as date) and s1.d <= cast(:enddatetime as date)

columngroup.sql: select name as groupname, code as groupparam from wares where incl > 0

columns.sql: select volume from (select s.id as session_id, cast(s.startdatetime as date) as d, azscode from sessions s order by d) s1 left join (select i.session_id, sum(volume) as volume from sessions s join inoutgsm i on s.id = i.session_id where s.azscode = :azscode and ware_code = :groupparam and payment_code = '01ТЛ00' and s.startdatetime >= :startdatetime and s.startdatetime <= :enddatetime + 1 group by session_id, sessionnum) s2 on s1.session_id = s2.session_id where s1.azscode = :azscode and s1.d >= cast(:startdatetime as date) and s1.d <= cast(:enddatetime as date)
